thread.title: Transforming Software Engineering: Catalyst IT Services is Now Catalyst DevWorks
thread.title_full: Transforming Software Engineering: Catalyst IT Services is Now Catalyst DevWorks - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Transforming Software Engineering: Catalyst IT Services is Now Catalyst DevWorks
text:
Catalyst rebrands to reflect more accurately how it transforms enterprise engineering capability
Baltimore, MD
Catalyst IT Services, the recognized leader in helping enterprises develop products and innovate by applying data to assembling software engineering teams, announced today that it is renaming itself Catalyst DevWorks, with the tagline “Transforming Software Engineering.” This change reflects more accurately the company’s mission to help enterprises re-think their approach to building and extending software development capabilities.
Long-known as a provider of software engineering teams for innovation and product development, Catalyst has received numerous accolades from analysts and Fortune 500 clients for its core technology that uses big data to accelerate engineering talent acquisition and dramatically improves software engineering team outcomes. This “moneyball” approach has been described as disruptive to the industry, changing how enterprises approach the outsourcing of application development work. With this name change, Catalyst is also branding its core big data technology, the Catalyst Talent Platform, for licensing by qualified clients as a hosted service, bringing this same disruptive technology directly to clients, helping them transform the way they make full-time engineering hires.
“CIOs and technology organizations are constantly struggling to respond effectively to business demands for innovation,” said Catalyst DevWorks CEO, Michael Rosenbaum. “For nearly 15 years, Catalyst has been using our technology to assemble engineering teams, giving our clients a simple way of using our platform and disintermediating our technology from the customer. As we announce our name change, we are also announcing more broadly our second solution, one that provides clients with predictive analytics, supported by machine learning, for identifying individual engineers and engineering teams who are most likely to be exceptional performers in a client’s specific environment.”
Through both its engineering services with teams assembled by the technology and the direct licensing of the Catalyst Talent Platform, Catalyst is expanding the engineering talent pool, accelerating talent acquisition, dramatically increasing productivity, and giving technology leaders the ability to partner more effectively with a range of peers and other constituencies inside the enterprise.
“The term DevWorks reflects our disruptive approach to assembling software engineering teams by applying predictive analytics to software engineers and engineering teams, giving us and our clients the ability to optimize for engineering and business outcomes,” said Rosenbaum. “Today, we reinforce our commitment to helping enterprises develop and deploy technology innovation.”
About Catalyst DevWorks
Catalyst DevWorks provides rapid response software engineering capabilities for innovation and product development, as well as a technology platform that enables the use of predictive analytics and machine learning for full time engineering hires. Catalyst is an innovator in applying big data to team assembly in order to ramp capacity rapidly and transform productivity and quality, delivering better results, faster, at costs equivalent to or less than traditional full time hiring or global outsourcing. For further information regarding Catalyst DevWorks, please visit http://www.CatalystDevWorks.com .
